title: TigerSpot
description: An interactive geographical guessing game web-app for Princeton students and faculty to help them learn about various places/landmarks on campus and interact more with the Princeton community.

title: Word Hunt Solver and Learner
description: A web-app that solves Apple's GamePigeon Word Hunt game using DFS and Tries. Looks for all possible words given user input and outputs word paths and word definitions to encourage learning.

title: Midwest Showdown
description: A two-player game on one keyboard developed through Java GUI. Utilizies Java Draw library for graphics and Java Audio library for pre-selected music options.
